data.oai_dc:dc: Mean Census Dates for 200 litter traps located on Barro Colorado Island, Panama.

CensusMeanDates.txt holds three variables. The variable "census" is an integer representing a weekly census of 200 litter traps. The variable "date.mean" is the average date the 200 traps were visited in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format. The variable "ndays" is the same average date expressed as the integer number of days since 1 January 1980.
